SEARCH
Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.resource

Class User

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.resource.AbstractResource
it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.resource.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
public class User extends AbstractResource
User class represents a user entity in the database. This class encapsulates user information such as ID, email, password, name, surname, address, and account type. It provides constructors for various scenarios including user creation, login, and retrieval.
Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Filippo Galli (filippo.galli@studenti.unipd.it), Michele Scapinello (michele.scapinello@studenti.unipd.it)

    • writeJSON

      protected void writeJSON(OutputStream out) throws Exception
      Writes JSON representation of the user object to the provided output stream. This method is used to serialize the user object into JSON format.
      Specified by:
      writeJSON in class AbstractResource
      Parameters:
      out - The output stream to which the JSON data will be written.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while writing JSON data.

    • fromJSON

      public static User fromJSON(InputStream in) throws IOException
      Constructs a User object from JSON data read from the provided input stream. This method is used to deserialize JSON data into a user object.
      Parameters:
      in - The input stream containing the JSON data representing the user object.
      Returns:
      A new User object constructed from the JSON data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading JSON data.
